title: Interpretation of a dream about kissing the dead in a dream

preview.html: A person may see this dream due to the reflection of his subconscious mind in his dreams as a result of excessive thinking about the deceased person and longing for him and needing him, and it may be a sign for the dreamer to pray for this person and give alms for his soul. Interpretation of seeing a dream about living kissing the dead in a dream about a single girl When an unmarried girl sees a dead man and kisses him, this is a good vision. It indicates the approaching date of the dreamer's marriage to the right person and loves him if he is of marriageable age. If an unmarried woman is not of marriageable age and dreams that she is kissing a dead man, this also has a good interpretation. It indicates her success in her studies or the possibility of achieving a dream that she is trying to achieve a lot. A girl dreams that she is kissing her deceased father or her deceased mother. The dream portends the dreamer's need to see her mother or her deceased father. And the lack of a sense of security and self-control after separation, and she must remember them in her prayers. If the dead person kisses an unmarried girl in a dream, the dream is good news that he will get a lot of money from this dead person, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman sees the same vision, the age of marriage is actually delayed. Her marriage may soon indicate the son of the dead person whom she saw in her dream or from Close to him. In general, seeing the dead receiving an unmarried woman in a dream is one of the happy dreams and indicates the coming of goodness, the expansion of livelihood, and the fulfillment of dreams, God willing. Also, seeing an unmarried woman receiving a deceased person she does not know is a good dream. Which portends many benefits that she will obtain in the near future, and God is greater and more knowledgeable. Watching a kiss and hugging a dead friend in a single girl’s dream. It indicates the blessing of old age, good morals, and closeness to God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the dead returning to life for singles Interpretation of seeing a dream about a living person kissing a dead person in a dream about a married woman If a married woman sees in a dream that she is kissing the hand of a dead person. The vision indicates benefiting from that person whom she saw in the dream, such as obtaining an inheritance. As for seeing a dead person kissing a married woman in a dream. The interpretation of the dream is that she will live a quiet and stable life with her husband and children. If a married woman sees in her dream one of her deceased fathers and kisses his hands. The interpretation of the vision with the need of the dreamer for her at the present time. And he thinks about them a lot, and prays and believes in their souls. When a married woman sees a dead person in reality, she kisses him. This Praiseworthy visions, and their interpretation is changing circumstances from bad to better, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. And if the dreamer sees her dead husband in a dream, he visits her and kisses her. The vision shows her longing for her husband who always made her feel loved and restricted, and the vision may be a sign of praying for him. When a married woman sees that her deceased husband in a dream kisses her hand, this has a praiseworthy interpretation. It indicates a good conclusion and the position he is in now. In general, a married woman can see a dead person she knows and kiss him. It shows how much she needs this person to be with her during the difficult times she is going through. title: The 7 most famous interpretations of seeing a bucket in a dream indicate good things to come

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a clean bucket? It means money that you get without your knowledge. The interpretation of seeing a bucket in a dream? Evidence of physical problems. What is the interpretation of a single man seeing that he bought a bucket? This means that he marries a low-income woman. The meaning of seeing the bucket and the married woman filling it from the well? This means that He puts effort into work that will not bear fruit. Interpretation of seeing a bucket containing water in it? I mean, this is better for her than others. Interpretation of seeing a bucket in a dream. An Aquarius in a dream is a person who gets money despite his ignorance and lack of knowledge. If the bucket contains water And the man drank from it, it is money he earned from extreme fatigue and effort. If the bucket is empty of water, this is a sign of the least benefit you will get after patience. Ibn Shaheen said that a clean bucket means money that you get without your knowledge, but you benefit a lot from it. Vision A dream about a bucket of water. Interpretation of seeing a bucket “bucket” means a lot of fears that fall into it, and you will not be able to get out of it until some time has passed. It is said that the bucket in the dream represents material problems and they need help and effort to overcome them peacefully. Miller said that the bucket of milk It means that you go with good friends and benefit from them. Dream of a bucket if it is empty of water, you will feel hungry, or something bad will happen to your land and crops. Carrying water in a dream A bucket is made to carry water, and although seeing a bucket is not good in general, we They are exempt here if it is filled with water, because water is the source of life and sustenance. That is why if a virgin finds herself carrying a bucket full of water, it is said that this means that she will get married soon. If a married woman finds that the bucket has a lot of water and it is in her home, then she must pay taxes or burdens Finance Perhaps it is time to pay overdue water bills, for example, and a man carrying a bucket of water, this is a successful business or money he gets helplessly. Dream Interpretation Bucket for Single WomenA pail is a pail or pail, but it is used for household chores, and it is said that it is a servant Home, “The Maid”. If a single person dreams of buying a bucket, this means that he is marrying a woman from a low-income category, but she is beautiful. If an unmarried person finds that the bucket has fallen on him, this means that there is a material defect in his fiancée’s body that he has not yet seen. Dream of a Bucket For a married woman: Seeing a bucket and a married woman filling it from a well means that she is putting effort into projects that will not benefit her. If she dreamed that she was washing with water from a bucket, this means that her difficult affairs will become easier. Resolving from a bucket, which means that he needs to seek forgiveness and forgiveness from God Almighty. A dream about a tower The bucket in a pregnant woman’s dream, if it is white, means that she will give birth to a beautiful child. The interpretation of seeing a bucket containing water in it means the good that will happen to him from others. The bucket means an easy birth without pain. It has been said that the bucket means the birth of a male, and that Because the name of Aquarius is mentioned, and God Almighty knows best. Joy in a dream. Seeing grilled fish. Shrimps in a dream. Lentils in a dream. Seeing raw fish.

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about a nail according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a nail: Nails are among the things that we see in our lives in many places and uses. It is possible that we experience a nail bite that causes us excruciating pain and we see it on the furniture of our home, but when we see it in a dream, this dream confuses us and makes us look for a logical explanation. Therefore, we find different interpretations... with different details and the status of the dreamer, and this is our topic today. Interpretation of a dream about a nail in a dream. According to some commentators, the nail may refer to the holder of power who brings rights to their owners, and it may indicate the marriage of the person if seeing it, for example, is a means of installing some paintings on The wall. It can refer to many other things about a single girl, married woman or man. It can express good people, but it accompanies those with bad qualities, causing them to describe the same description and change their behavior in the future, so the vision carries a warning about the necessity of choosing friends. Interpretation of the vision of walking on claws Walking on nails actually causes serious harm to humans, especially if they He walks over her slowly, and the vision also has connotations related to these pains. If a divorced woman sees that her ex-husband is suffering from toenails in his leg, this is evidence of his remorse for the crimes he committed against her and that he is thinking of returning to her after admitting his guilt. As for the wife who sees in her dream that her husband is... The one who walks on nails, this dream indicates the husband’s steadfastness, strength of character, and endurance in the face of the difficulties he faces. Crosses through. In his life. If a woman sees that someone, but she does not know her, is walking on nails, then this dream indicates that someone around her will be hurt. As for a girl who is not yet married, her dreams indicate that she will perform tasks that were difficult for her in the past, but she She will have the ability to do it despite the difficulties she faced. If a girl sees that there is someone walking on stilts to reach her, then this is the person who seeks to marry her, and she will live a happy and fulfilling life with him. He is one of the persistent men who are able to achieve their goals. Interpretation of a dream about a nail in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin said in the interpretation of this dream that the nail has several connotations as follows: It represents the generous, arrogant man whom people turn to to meet their needs and help them solve their problems. But if it is tainted A nail and removing rust from it, this indicates that the dreamer will face some material problems, which will soon be eliminated by putting effort into his work. The dream may also indicate the insight that its owner has in most matters of life and he may have knowledge and the correct opinion. A nail exposed to rust indicates To the selfish person who does not like to help others, but only cares about himself, or it expresses that the dreamer is committing sins and transgressions, which turn off his heart and make him not see his mistakes. As for what was made of precious metal, it indicates the knowledge of the monarch, and the abundance of jurisprudence in matters of religion People turn to it to remind them of their Lord and God’s commandments and prohibitions. But it is

title: Interpretation of Friday prayer in a dream

preview.html: Many would like to know the interpretation of Friday prayer in a dream, which we will present to you in this article. Many of us see in a dream dreams that make him wake up confused because he does not know the meaning of this dream and whether it leads to good or bad, but the interpretation of each dream varies according to the details and condition of its owner. Is it a man or a woman, and whether she is single, married, or pregnant, and in the following lines we will present in the encyclopedia the interpretation of the dream of Friday prayer in detail, its repercussions, and the time lost for prayer. Interpretation of Friday prayer in a dream. Friday prayer in a dream for single people. If an unmarried girl dreams of performing Friday prayer, this is a sign. However, her life will move towards stability without feeling stress or tension. One of the auspicious dreams for her partner is when an unmarried woman sees in her sleep that she is performing the Friday prayer, and it is a sign of her good morals and that she is trying hard to please God in all her actions. As for the one who saw in her dream that there were many people in the mosque Prayers, this is a sign of goodness that will come to her. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is praying with the pilgrims, then it is fortunate that good news will come in her life and that God will give her a good and wise man to marry. Interpretation of Friday prayer in a dream for a married woman. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that if a woman She saw herself praying on Friday while she was asleep, then she will receive goodness from God, and that she is loyal to her husband. This vision may indicate that if the owner’s wife works, she will rise in status, or she will get a good job, or she may get a promotion, or her rank and status will rise. At work and you may get an excellent position. Among the warning dreams, if a married woman dreams of a woman leading the prayer, this is an indication that unexpected things will happen to her, and she must pray. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Friday prayer for a man in a dream. The scholar Ibn Shaheen explained that if If he saw himself praying on Friday in his dream, God will enrich him after his poverty and open the doors of livelihood for him, and God will bless him in performing the rituals of Hajj or Umrah, as a visit soon to visit. Offerings of God's Holy House..But if a person sees that he is performing the Friday prayer in his dream, this is good news that he will obtain many good things from many places, and his heart will rejoice, and God will bless him in his heart. His life, his family, and his children if he is married. Interpretation of missing Friday prayers in a dream: Seeing missed Friday prayers, as interpreted by the scholar Ibn Shaheen, indicates that the dreamer is someone who is falling behind in his relationship with God and does not perform basic duties every day. One of the most warning visions is if you see that you are lazy in performing Friday prayer, this is evidence that you have missed a great reward for performing this prayer and that you may lose your son or face major problems at work that will lead to you resigning from your job. But if you miss the time for prayer, this is a sign of great sadness that you will feel in your life and family problems may appear. Great. As for a pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she missed Friday prayers, this is a sign that she will face difficulty in giving birth, and the child may be in an abnormal condition.

Interpretation of missing Friday prayers in a dream: Seeing missed Friday prayers, as interpreted by the scholar Ibn Shaheen, indicates that the dreamer is someone who is falling behind in his relationship with God and does not perform basic duties every day. One of the most warning visions is if you see that you are lazy in performing Friday prayer, this is evidence that you have missed a great reward for performing this prayer and that you may lose your son or face major problems at work that will lead to you resigning from your job. But if you miss the time for prayer, this is a sign of great sadness that you will feel in your life and family problems may appear. Great. As for a pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she missed Friday prayers, this is a sign that she will face difficulty in giving birth, and the child may be in an abnormal condition.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing whole gold pounds in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing gold pounds in a dream. A laudable vision is one that many people have had. The vision may indicate the dreamer’s good deeds and the dreamer’s abundance of do-gooders, and God knows best. We have collected for you all the insights and interpretations from the great books of interpretation. Here, dear followers, we will present to you the complete interpretation of seeing gold pounds in a dream for married people, pregnant women, and men. The interpretation of seeing gold pounds in a dream was completed by Ibn Sirini. The great scholar Muhammad bin Shirin says that gold pounds in a dream as a whole may indicate the end of the dreamer’s worries and the coming together of many good things. Also, Seeing gold pounds in a dream can indicate happiness and sophistication, and that the dreamer is entering a new home, a new job, and a prestigious position. Also, seeing gold pounds in a dream can indicate the marriage of an ordinary girl soon, and the marriage of a bachelor as well and happiness. A pound of gold in a dream Woman: If an ordinary girl dreams that she sees gold coins in her dream, this indicates the loss of her fears as well as her short marriage to a good man. Also, seeing gold pounds in a dream can indicate happiness, the high status that the good girl will join, and honesty. Also, seeing pounds A whole golden pound in a dream can indicate great success and superiority, as well as the inclusion of a girl in a pot in a new business, and God knows best. Seeing golden pounds in a dream may indicate that a virtuous girl will enter into a new relationship with a young man who is paralyzed and her affairs will improve. What is the interpretation of seeing Golden pounds for a married woman? The interpretation of seeing golden pounds for a married woman may indicate the collapse of the woman’s worries, happiness, and success in all her upcoming affairs, God willing. Seeing the purchase of whole gold pounds in a dream means that the girl will enter a new job and achieve her ambitions, goals, and future affairs, and God knows best. Interpretation of the pound Gold in a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing full golden pounds in a pregnant woman’s dream, as this indicates the death of her worries, as well as the ease and imminence of her birth in the coming period. Seeing full golden pounds in a dream means that her husband and children will join her in a high position, and it may also indicate the cessation of Pain in the coming period. The complete interpretation of seeing a gold pound in a dream for a man. To see a handsome man in a dream who sees gold pounds or buys them in large quantities, this indicates the end of worries and disputes. Also, seeing gold pounds in a dream can indicate happiness that the dreamer will experience and it can indicate Also to many good things. Also, seeing gold pounds in a dream may mean that the dreamer will join a new job as well as good deeds soon. When a married man sees gold pounds in his dream, this indicates the collapse of family and marital disputes that are occurring. title: Interpretation of eggs in a dream and its meaning in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of eggs in a dream. Dreamers differed in this matter. Interpretation of eggs in a dream. Some of them showed that they carry evil among their mistakes, and some of them affirmed that they only bring good, but what we need to know is that each vision differs according to the condition and psychology of the fortuneteller. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream in a way GeneralWe know all the concepts withInterpretation of eggs in a dreamWhere am I interested in the siteDifferentI present it to you, as usual, with the interpretations of senior and experienced commentators.Ibn Sirin also believes that if one sees scorpion eggs in a dream, his dream shows poor offspring whose nature is bad and brings evil to his life.Confirmed by Ibn SirinInterpretation Eggs in a dream: For a woman, and they were white, then this dream is an indication of the birth of daughters. But if a man sees in his dream eggs coming to him from a hen, then this dream indicates the sustenance that will come to him, as it indicates an increase in his wealth and his offspring. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing eggs is a sign There are worries and pains, most of which are from the family, or perhaps severe distress befalls the dreamer. Also, whoever sees his wife laying eggs, this indicates that she is a woman whose offspring will be great and who will give birth to many children who will have fame and lineage among the people. Eating eggshells in a dream symbolizes that The dreamer is an evil person who slanders graves and violates the sanctity of the dead and their mistakes, God forbid. But if a person sees himself placing eggs in a bowl, he will marry more than one wife. Interpretation of eggs in a dream: Eggs in a man’s dream focus on the large number of women in his life. As for the one who sees himself eating An egg, and this egg is cooked or uncooked. This vision indicates that he is eating illicit money, which causes him worry. Whoever sees in his dream that he is peeling an egg, dropping its yolk, and eating its white, this is evidence that he is a person digging graves. Seeing a monochromatic egg varies. In a dream, about the interpretation of eggs in a dream in general because it shows that the dreamer will marry from a different country and nationality and that his children will be from different cultures. What about seeing broken eggs? Seeing an egg being broken in a single person’s dream means that he will get married and break his wife’s hymen, and if he cannot break the egg in the dream He will not be able to complete it on his wedding day. If one sees in his dream that someone else has given him an egg, this means that he will have a just and righteous son, but if the egg breaks, the boy will die. Broken eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream This is an unpleasant vision because it indicates a fall The fetus or a serious rivalry and major problems with her husband. Interpretation of eggs in a dream: Generally, they can indicate disagreements and disputes that lead to rivalry and separation. Also, buying eggs in a dream suggests that the dreamer will get old money that he had with someone and the return of his lost right to him. Beating strong, strong eggs in a dream for a man who has a pregnant wife, this is a vision that indicates that he will miscarry her fetus. Whoever sees that another person breaks an egg in his dream in front of him, and after he breaks it gives it to the pioneer, this vision symbolizes that this man will get married and break the hymen of the dreamer’s daughter. They buy eggs but they break after they buy them. This is yes

title: Interpretation of dreams of falling in a dream Falling in a dream is the complete correct interpretation

preview.html: Today we present to you the interpretation of a dream about falling in a dream, falling in a dream, through this article, God Almighty said: “O leaders, advise me in my vision, if you are a vision, then you are crossing the dream, from a place where we see the fall (43). , Or we fall into a hole, or from a ladder, and many other images of falling that carry many different interpretations according to the condition of the fortune teller, and on the Encyclopedia website today we present these interpretations, follow us. Interpretation of a dream about falling in a dream Seeing a dream of falling from a high place and that place is beautiful and then falling from it to a bad place. This vision shows the failure of insight and his inability to achieve his goals. This vision also indicates that the dreamer will get abundant money and will be promoted at work. Another interpretation of this vision is that it expresses a major change in the dreamer's circumstances in all respects. Seeing falling from a high place also indicates that many problems and crises are approaching the dreamer's life. If a person sees in a dream that he is standing about to fall from a height in a dream, this vision indicates that he is confused about something in his life and is unable to make a decision. Seeing the fall in a dream also symbolizes the dreamer's escape from dealing with all his problems and crises. Interpretation of falling down the stairs in a dream If a person sees himself falling down the stairs. This vision expresses the emergence of some major problems in the dreamer's life at the work level. Seeing yourself falling down the stairs in a dream also indicates a state of separation that occurs between family members due to distance from religion. If the dreamer sees someone else falling down the stairs. This vision shows the dreamer's love for that person. As for seeing the dreamer being saved by someone else falling down the stairs. This vision symbolizes that he needs the help of the fortune teller to overcome his crises. Interpretation of surviving a fall in a dream If one sees in his dream that he is escaping from death and does not fall, then this vision symbolizes the dreamer's dedication to his work, wealth, and love for his family and preserving them. Interpretation of falling in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing a fall from a high place in a dream indicates the coming new stage in the dreamer's life. Another interpretation is that seeing a fall represents a punishment from the dreamer's subconscious. But if one sees himself falling in a dream, he dies. This vision expresses the dreamer's deliverance from all crises and problems in his life soon. If you see a fall in a dream with blood flowing. The vision is a sign of liberation from all anxiety and anxiety. If someone sees in a dream that he is falling from the roof of his house. This vision indicates that he will move to another house. Interpretation of a dream about children falling Ibn Sirin's interpretation of a child falling in a dream Seeing a child falling in a dream is one of the undesirable visions that express the coming of some bad things in the dreamer's life and also expresses his exposure to a financial crisis in the coming period. But if someone sees a child falling from a high place, the dreamer picks him up and saves him. This vision symbolizes the dreamer's tendency towards all the problems and crises in his life. If a married woman sees in a dream that her child is falling from above. This vision expresses the extent of her fears.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about eating figs and grapes from Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream about eating green grapes, and the interpretation of a dream about eating figs from a tree.

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing figs and grapes in a dream: Seeing fruit is one of the visions that carries many connotations. Every fruit has its meanings and significance, whether large or small, and what concerns us in this article is mentioning all the special cases and connotations of a dream about eating figs and figs. And grapes in a dream. Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of eating figs and grapes. Interpretation of the dream of eating figs and grapes. Seeing figs and grapes represents money and earned livelihood, and projects and experiences that qualify a person to achieve his goals simply and without fatigue and effort. If a person sees that he is eating figs and grapes, this indicates long-lived offspring. , good offspring, great gains, successes and fruitful achievements at all levels. The vision may also indicate a person who is investigating the money he earns and is trying hard to discover its true source. If the monarch sees that he is eating figs and grapes, this portends comfort in his affairs, and salvation from his worries and sorrows, And the end of a dark period in his life, and the restoration of his previous state. And if he sees that he is eating grapes, this indicates the benefit that the man derives from the woman, as he can make a lot of money because of the woman. I see Nabulsi, eating grapes indicates the accumulation of a large amount of money without fatigue or unhappiness. In terms of Psychologically, this vision is an indication of intercourse, the woman’s reproductive organs, extensive offspring and emotional experience. Interpretation of the dream of eating figs and grapes by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of the vision of figs and grapes that figs symbolize a rich man and that grapes symbolize a wise, generous man who is beneficial to others. The vision Eating figs and grapes expresses a lawful life, simplicity, kindness and humility, the enjoyment of multiple skills and abilities, and a kind of agility and speed when facing any circumstances or events that require a quick response. If a person sees that he is eating from a handful of grapes and then throws the rest of them on the ground, this indicates Many quarrels and disagreements with his wife, and his circumstances were turned upside down. If he saw that he was eating figs, this indicates ease of earning and sustenance, inclination towards the righteous, and frequent sitting with them. Seeing figs and eating them could be a sign of remorse and sadness, based on the claim that the tree that God forbade approaching it, and the one from which our master Adam ate was the fig tree. Also, the vision of eating religion and grapes indicates health and blessing in life, livelihood, skill, honesty, acquiring knowledge and striving for self-education. As for the vision of eating fig or grape jam, it is a symbol of praise, praise and appreciation that gains brilliance. Personality and fame among people. And whoever is immoral and sees that he is eating grapes, this symbolizes drinking alcohol and committing sins and lying. And whoever is righteous eats figs, this is money that a man reaps and steals from an honest man. Interpretation of a dream about eating figs and grapes for a single woman. Seeing figs and grapes in a dream symbolizes purity, cover, and food. Blessing in work, freedom from distress and sadness, and a feeling of psychological comfort. If he sees grapes, this indicates marriage in the near future and enjoyment of charming beauty and good looks, etc.

title: Interpretation of a dream about lightning and thunder for a divorced woman

preview.html: Lightning is a sound that occurs as a result of clouds colliding with each other in the sky, and it is one of the natural factors in the universe. Today from gptafser.com/ we discuss the meanings and signs of seeing lightning and thunder in a dream for men and women in detail. Interpretation of seeing lightning and thunder in a dream for a single girl. A single girl when she dreams of seeing lightning or thunder in the sky in a dream. It is a sign that she will discover some things in her life and will admire them in the future. The beginning. But the matter is otherwise in reality, and here she must be careful, and God knows best. But when a single girl sees in her dream lightning or thunder entering her house. The dream indicates that a pleasant surprise will happen to her that will make her very happy, and God knows best. In the case of an unmarried girl who She sees lightning in a dream and prays to God to fulfill all her desires. This dream is good for her and good news that her wishes will come true in the near future, and God knows best. Seeing lightning or thunder in a dream is for an unmarried girl and she was afraid and cried in the dream. The vision indicates that the dreamer has committed a great sin. He feels remorse and remorse, so he repents to God Almighty and draws closer to Him, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing lightning in a dream and its meaning by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing lightning and thunder in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the sky raining with the appearance of lightning and thunder in a dream for a married woman. A good sign that the dreamer will receive a lot of happiness. Goodness and hearing good news, and God knows best. And if a married woman dreams of the sound of thunder, then she sees lightning in the dream and the sky is raining. A warning vision for her about some things in her life. In it, she must be keen to achieve goodness in her life, and God knows best. And if the married woman She dreams of seeing lightning in a dream, and she is very afraid of it for her children. Pointing out to the dreamer the need to take care of her children, and be careful not to get infected or contract them from others, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing lightning and thunder in a dream about a man and its meaning. A man who sees lightning in a dream is a sign of He will obtain a lot of goodness in his life, and God knows best. The vision may also mean that the dreamer enjoys stability in his academic and professional life, and God knows best. A man sees that he hears thunder and sees lightning at the same time in a dream. Good news for good nutrition, which may be a legacy that was not He is aware of it. The vision may be a warning to him not to rush into anything in his life, and God knows best. Seeing lightning and then rain in a dream for a man. It signifies the appearance of good things or hearing good news for the dreamer, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about heavy rain by Ibn Sirin. Meaning of seeing lightning And thunder in a pregnant woman’s sleep and its interpretation: A pregnant woman sees lightning and sees its bright light in her house in a dream. And sight means that her life is stable and the pregnancy is going smoothly, and God knows best. And in the event that he sees hearing the sound of thunder and then seeing lightning in a dream about a pregnant woman, and he feels fear about that in the dream. And this The dream warns her of the need to wait and be careful in making decisions about pregnancy and childbirth, and God knows best. The vision also shows that the dreamer is neglecting her health, which affects the health of the fetus. Here he must protect himself, and
